The b3Quaternion implements quaternion to perform linear algebra rotations in combination with b3Matrix3x3, b3Vector3 and b3Transform. More...

Detailed Description

The b3Quaternion implements quaternion to perform linear algebra rotations in combination with b3Matrix3x3, b3Vector3 and b3Transform.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

const b3Scalar &  _angle 
) [inline]

Axis angle Constructor.

Parameters:
axis The axis which the rotation is around
angle The magnitude of the rotation around the angle (Radians)

const b3Scalar &  pitch,
const b3Scalar &  roll 
) [inline]

Constructor from Euler angles.

Parameters:
yaw Angle around Y unless B3_EULER_DEFAULT_ZYX defined then Z
pitch Angle around X unless B3_EULER_DEFAULT_ZYX defined then Y
roll Angle around Z unless B3_EULER_DEFAULT_ZYX defined then X

b3Quaternion b3Quaternion::slerp ( const b3Quaternion &  q,
const b3Scalar &  t 
) const [inline]

Return the quaternion which is the result of Spherical Linear Interpolation between this and the other quaternion.

Parameters:
q The other quaternion to interpolate with
t The ratio between this and q to interpolate. If t = 0 the result is this, if t=1 the result is q. Slerp interpolates assuming constant velocity.
